name: Spiders & Georg
description:
Spiders & Georg

So...I have only been working digitally for a long time and I never draw, but I had an idea for a 12-Word RPG after seeing that it's the 20 years since the Spiders Georg tumblr post:

“average person eats 3 spiders a year” factoid actualy just statistical error. average person eats 0 spiders per year. Spiders Georg, who lives in cave & eats over 10,000 each day, is an outlier adn should not have been counted

and after being really inspired by some of the entries to the 12-Word RPG Jam: 

Six and Two Threes by Myfawnwy

Six 12-word RPGs in postcard size.

Roadwarden by g0ri

A 2d6 Minutes Fantasy RPG

I wanted to do something quick and messy (something I normally find impossible because autism, perfectionism, and lack of confidence) that I could just make and share and have the doing of it be a huge step for me, regardless of the quality of the thing itself.

I did this all in a few hours, hence the awful photos, but actually managing to focus with ADHD meds and do all these things I either can't or don't allow myself to do, so yeah.
